name: overview
headline: Overview
content:
L1-Systems expert in the aviation field, bringing solutions to several services and systems.
Some of them include:
  • Aerial platform design and implementation services.
  • Customization for SIGINT and ELINT systems.
  • Preventive and corrective maintenance.
  • Geo-location and control sensors and software.

name: UAVs
headline: UAVs
content:
L1-Systems provide unmanned aerial vehicles solutions including both Autonomous aircraft and Remotely piloted aircraft.
A few of our products are:
  • Target and decoy.
  • Reconnaissance.
  • Combat.
  • Logistics.
  • Research and development.
  • Civil and commercial.

name: SIGINT
headline: SIGINT
content: L1-Systems provides a range of SIGINT gathering and analysis solutions for aircraft, tailoring software and hardware to the carrier platform, and customizing equipment to respond to the needs of our customer's intelligence-gathering.

name: Tools, Equipment & Components
headline: Tools
content:
L1-Systems brings a range of equipment, tools and components for aerial platforms.

Our experts will provide your aircraft with the required component, performing to spec.
Such platforms include:
  • Replacement of existing parts.
  • Design and customization of tailored elements.
  • Operators seats.
  • Specialized antennas.
  • Landing gear for extreme environments.

name: Support, Maintenance, Repair
headline: Support, Maintenance, Repair
content: L1-Systems introduce a whole range of support services for any customer, from the replacement of worn out or damaged elements, to the maintenance of aircraft components - both software and hardware.

name: Platforms
headline: Platforms
content:
L1-Systems offer a huge amount of aerial platforms, such as:
  • Emergency response requirements.
  • Aircraft and UAVs for military.
  • Law enforcement.
  • Fire control.
  • Helicopters.
With years of experience in aviation, L1-Systems provide a global understanding of the marker offering, and help choose the platform that fits the customer's unique requirements and needs.
